articles.author: Ashish Dangwal
articles.title: Threatened By EW Attack, North Korea Warns US Of ‘Declaration Of War’ If Space Assets Attacked - EurAsian Times
articles.description: North Korea issued a stern warning on December 2, stating that any interference with its satellite operations would be perceived as a declaration of war.
articles.content:
North Korea issued a stern warning to the US on December 2 that any interference with its satellite operations would be perceived as a declaration of war.
